```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read.csv("../data/2023-07-19_tumor-size_R-formatted.csv")

head(x)
```

```{r}
m17 <- x %>%
  filter(experiment == "mimic17") %>%
  filter(days.from.injection == 21)
```


```{r}
box <- 
  m17 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = microbiome.sample, y = tumor.volume)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = treatment)) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Gavage",
       y = "Tumor Volume",
       fill = "Treatment") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")

box + 
  labs(x = "") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
ggsave("../figures/mimic17_boxplot_talk.png",
       height = 4, width = 4)

box +
  theme_bw(base_size = 18)
ggsave("../figures/mimic17_boxplot_poster.png",
       height = 5, width = 7)
```
